TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension extends System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension

Docs.summary: Defines the collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicates the applications that use the key. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An enhanced key usage (EKU) extension is a collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicate the applications that use the key.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to open a user’s personal certificate store and display information about each certificate in the store. This example uses the X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension class to display the information.
[!code-cs[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.security.crypto_33_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.security.crypto_33_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.security.crypto_33_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this method to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> class. After the instance has been created, you can then use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension.EnhancedKeyUsages%2A> property to obtain the collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicate the applications that use the key.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to open a user’s personal certificate store and display information about each certificate in the store. This example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> class to display the information.
[!code-cs[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/85956cef-a301-4a88-b453-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/85956cef-a301-4a88-b453-_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/85956cef-a301-4a88-b453-_1.cpp)]

remarks.format:
